--- alter_sequence_set_options.sql
ALTER SEQUENCE my_sequence SET OPTIONS (skip_range_min=1, skip_range_max=1234567)

--- AST
&ast.AlterSequence{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 15,
        NameEnd: 26,
        Name:    "my_sequence",
      },
    },
  },
  Options: &ast.Options{
    Options: 31,
    Rparen:  80,
    Records: []*ast.OptionsDef{
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 40,
          NameEnd: 54,
          Name:    "skip_range_min",
        },
        Value: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 55,
          ValueEnd: 56,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "1",
        },
      },
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 58,
          NameEnd: 72,
          Name:    "skip_range_max",
        },
        Value: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 73,
          ValueEnd: 80,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "1234567",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  RestartCounterWith: (*ast.RestartCounterWith)(nil),
  SkipRange:          (*ast.SkipRange)(nil),
  NoSkipRange:        (*ast.NoSkipRange)(nil),
}

--- SQL
ALTER SEQUENCE my_sequence SET OPTIONS (skip_range_min = 1, skip_range_max = 1234567)
